edu.cornell.gdiac.starstruck

Enum GameCanvas.BlendState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<GameCanvas.BlendState>
      • edu.cornell.gdiac.starstruck.GameCanvas.BlendState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GameCanvas.BlendState>
    Enclosing class:
    GameCanvas

    public static enum GameCanvas.BlendState
extends java.lang.Enum<GameCanvas.BlendState>
    Enumeration of supported BlendStates. For reasons of convenience, we do not allow user-defined blend functions. 99% of the time, we find that the following blend modes are sufficient (particularly with 2D games).

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ADDITIVE
      Color values are added together, causing a white-out effect
      ALPHA_BLEND
      Alpha blending on, assuming the colors have pre-multipled alpha (DEFAULT)
      NO_PREMULT
      Alpha blending on, assuming the colors have no pre-multipled alpha
      OPAQUE
      Color values are draw on top of one another with no transparency support
